    #include<iostream>
    #include <unordered_map>
    #define MAX(a, b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))
    #define ull unsigned long long int
    #define gc getchar_unlocked
    using namespace std;

    ull read_int() {
      char c = gc();
      while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
      ull ret = 0;
      while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
        ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
        c = gc();
      }
      return ret;
    }

    int main()
    {
        long long int t,i,n,mx,val;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
            cin>>n;
            
            mx=-1;
            std::unordered_map<int,int> mp;
            for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                val = read_int();
                if (mp.find(val) == mp.end())
                    mp[val]=1;
                else
                    mp[val]=mp[val]+1;
                mx = MAX(mx,mp[val]);
            }
            cout<<mx<<endl;
        }
    }
